title: China Small-Cap Rally Triggers Hunt for More A-Shares, UBS Says
description: Gains in Chinese small caps have spurred global investors to seek shares not available via a Hong Kong transaction channel, according to UBS Group AG.
content: Gains in Chinese small caps have spurred global investors to seek shares not available via a Hong Kong transaction channel, according to UBS Group AG.
